summary: The 'Physicians for Underserved Areas Act' (S. 1044) aims to improve the redistribution of Medicare residency slots when hospitals close. It amends the Social Security Act to change how these slots are allocated, focusing on the likelihood of new hospitals utilizing and filling the positions within specific timeframes. The bill is sponsored by Ms. Rosen and Mr. Boozman and would apply to hospital closures on or after the enactment date.
